jobDescription: Cisco Refresh is an evolution of the Cisco Certified Refurbished Equipment (CCRE) program. Leveraging the circular economy, the Cisco Refresh brand forms the cornerstone of a range of value-added lifecycle solutions for our Partners and customers, including but not limited to remanufacturing and selling pre-owned Cisco equipment.Who You'll Work WithSale of Cisco pre-owned equipment is a $3B market. The Cisco Refresh organization is driving aggressive sales and growth targets to become the #1 or #2 player in this market. The Cisco Refresh organization is like a small startup and consists of a dynamic team that is responsible for all aspects of the business such as Engineering, NPI, Manufacturing, Supply Chain Operations, IT, Sales, and Marketing.What You'll DoRole & Responsibilities**
